mapper.select: SELECT id, frozen_user_id, operating_user_id, frozen_time, frozen_reason, unfreezing_time, remake FROM t_frozen_information WHERE id = ( SELECT t.id FROM t_frozen_information t WHERE t.frozen_user_id = #{userId} AND t.unfreezing_time > #{date} AND t.deleted = 0 GROUP BY t.id HAVING MAX(t.unfreezing_time) );
